name: Neant
text: To feel, yes ! Therein lies your cure !

name: Neant
text: But despite your knotted stomach, you seem to feel nothing.

name: Neant
text: Physical pain is unknown to you in this place.

name: Neant
text: Your very own body appears strange to you.

name: Neant
text: Although you can see and hear, you perceive neither odor nor the usual taste of your saliva

name: Neant
text: Feeling was your glimmer of hope, but you killed it when you realized it was physically impossible.

name: Neant
text: Because your body itself seems to be missing.
